title: Revert "Optimize FileExists lookup (#6033)"
body:
This commit broke RPS (https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_git/VS/pullrequest/302845)
Reverting it fixed RPS (https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_git/VS/pullrequest/303584)

commit.message:
Revert "Optimize FileExists lookup (#6033)"

This reverts commit 01ceb4e6dadb3fa41c90626899d68d640aa22db4.

nodes.body: @rokonec, unless you have a better suggestion? I'm guessing this is because you eagerly loaded everything in relevant directories.
